text: hi my name is colin and i'm six years
old this is the story of the time i
learned how to ride my bike without
training wheels for the very first time
i couldn't wait to learn so i could ride
to school my dad and i took the training
wheels off my bike
with his tools coming on look at that oh
cool we went to a park near our house
are you nervous
hello don't worry about it i'm 100 sure
you can do it first thing we did is
check the tires then we took the brakes
i made sure to put on my knee pads my
elbow pads and my helmet i was all ready
let's roll
okay watch your balance here we go okay
then my dad started pushing me on my
bike i was kind of nervous just a little
bit nervous not a lot
when my dad first let me go i wobbled
alive careful we kept on running back
and forth and back and forth wobbling
skinning whoa
finally my dad pushed me and let go
remember use your balance okay got it
okay nice okay and i was doing it
the best part was when we went fast very
very very fast
and now i can ride to school and i don't
need any training wheels
you just watched a tti on disney channel
